data.title: Airlines at The Wilmington Airport • Fly ILM
data.meta_description: Nonstop flights between Wilmington International Airport (ILM) and numerous city pairs are provided by American Airlines, Delta, and United.
data.text:
Click to book your trip now to/from ILM directly through our partners:

Interested in Discovering Wilmington, the Cape Fear Area, and our Island Beaches?

From a riverfront city steeped in historic charm to three scenic island beaches, Wilmington, NC offers the best of the Carolina coast – all in one place. Experience a coastal destination where no two getaways are alike. With an award-winning Riverwalk that winds around the storied Cape Fear River and Carolina, Kure and Wrightsville Beaches just minutes away, discover more and start planning your trip.

Select Area Hotel Options (Learn more about how to have your hotel listed.)
